mapper.sql: guid, sn, version, cardno, cardtime, result, reporttime, message, eventtype, cardtype
mapper.insert: insert into record_door (guid, sn, version, cardno, cardtime, result, reporttime, message, eventtype, cardtype) values (#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{result,jdbcType=BIT}, #{reporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into record_door
guid,
sn,
version,
cardno,
cardtime,
result,
reporttime,
message,
eventtype,
cardtype,
#{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update record_door
sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardno = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardtime = #{cardtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
result = #{result,jdbcType=BIT},
reporttime = #{reporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eventtype = #{eventtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cardtype = #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update record_door set sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardno = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardtime = #{cardtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, result = #{result,jdbcType=BIT}, reporttime = #{reporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eventtype = #{eventtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cardtype = #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(0) from record_door where 1=1
AND sn like CONCAT('%',#{entity.sn},'%')

select
from record_door where 1=1
AND sn like CONCAT('%',#{entity.sn},'%')
limit #{start},#{length}
